definition: Jing, one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/surname Jing
Thucydides trap (theory that war results when a dominant established power fears the rise of a rival power)
pinyin: Xiu1 xi1 di3 de2 xian4 jing3

sentences.english: The polaron effects on excitons in a parabolic quantum well are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了拋物阱中極化子效應對激子的影響。

sentences.english: Sounding the tanks and cargo hold bilges adjacent to collision area.
sentences.chinese: 測量碰撞附近的艙櫃和貨艙污水阱。

sentences.english: An infrared laser system traps the atoms, locking them into pancake-shaped wells.
sentences.chinese: 紅外線激光俘獲原子，將它們陷在晶格阱中。

sentences.english: The effect of resonant-tunnelling appears in the structure.
sentences.chinese: 在多量子阱結構中可看到明顯的共振隧穿效應。

sentences.english: The scheme for preparing the Schrodinger cat states is proposed in the strong excitation regime of the ion trap.
sentences.chinese: 提出在離子阱的強激發區製備薛定諤貓態的方案。

sentences.english: The paper mainly introduces the application of detecting techniques of ion trap to petroleum chemical exploration.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介紹離子阱檢測技術在油氣化探中的應用。

sentences.english: He who digs a hole and scoops it out falls into the pit he has made.
sentences.chinese: 他掘了坑，又挖深了，竟掉在自己所挖的阱裏。

sentences.english: InP/InGaAsP tensile strained multiple quantum wells are grown by MOCVD technique.
sentences.chinese: 採用張應變量子阱結構，生長了光放大器材料。

sentences.english: The development of the organic quantum-well structure devices was introduced systemically.
sentences.chinese: 製備了普通的有機量子阱結構，並對結構進行了表徵。

sentences.english: We also discuss the effect of laser line width on the depth of potential well.
sentences.chinese: 還討論了激光線寬對微腔中偶極阱阱深的影響。

sentences.english: Non-resonant waveforms are not harmonious with the frequencies of the electrons held in the ion trap.
sentences.chinese: 非共振波形與離子阱所捕捉的電子頻率不一致。

sentences.english: This state corresponds to a lowest energy state in the first quantum well.
sentences.chinese: 此狀態對應第一個量子阱的最低能態。
